title: Number of missing persons files in the U.S. by race 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of missing persons for 5 number of Races.
Race White has the highest Number of missing persons and Indian has the lowest Number of missing persons.
There is a difference of 349321.0 between the maximum Race White and minimum Race Indian.
